  • Introduction
    Daniel Rubio • Jun 7, 2015

    My name is Daniel Rubio, I’m 23 years old, a soon-to-be-father, and glass half full kind of man. I’m a digital content creator that is based in Utah. I focus on Filmmaking, but I’ve recently found a love for audio creation. Primarily podcasting and I’m beginning to think that I’d like to work in that field and use filmmaking as my creative outlet. I am LDS( Latter Day Saint) or Mormon. I served a two year Spanish speaking mission in New England. I’m married to the women of my dreams. I love food and meeting new people.
